# Interface InworldSpeechSynthesisConfigInterface

Interface for configuring Inworld speech synthesis configuration.

interface InworldSpeechSynthesisConfigInterface {  
inference?: [SpeechSynthesisInferenceConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.SpeechSynthesisInferenceConfigInterface);  
model_id?: string;  
postprocessing?: [SpeechSynthesisPostprocessingConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.SpeechSynthesisPostprocessingConfigInterface);  
}

##### Index

### Properties

inference? model_id? postprocessing?

## Properties

### `Optional`inference

inference?: [SpeechSynthesisInferenceConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.SpeechSynthesisInferenceConfigInterface)

The inference configuration for the speech synthesis.

### `Optional`model_id

model_id?: string

The model ID (inworld-tts-1 or inworld-tts-1-max) for the speech synthesis. If not set, the v2 model will be used by default.

### `Optional`postprocessing

postprocessing?: [SpeechSynthesisPostprocessingConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.SpeechSynthesisPostprocessingConfigInterface)

The postprocessing configuration for the speech synthesis.

### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
